title: AI Usage

tools.usage: Dung de xay dung bo khung thong diep va flow cau hoi theo tung chu de.

tools.name: Gemini

tools.usage: Ho tro tong hop y tuong ve minh chung thuc tien cho moi phan.
tools.verification: Kiem tra do tin cay cua nguon va loai bo thong tin khong ro xuat xu.

tools.name: Grok
tools.role: Phan bien noi dung va kiem tra logic lap luan
tools.usage: Dat cau hoi nguoc de phat hien lo hong trong thong diep va game mechanics.
tools.verification: Nhom bien tap lai cau chu, tranh sao chep va giu dung boi canh mon hoc.
